name: Pleasant Resident
description:
Pleasant Resident is a survival-comedy (hopefully) game where you walk into a weird building and make a bunch of sad guys happy by shooting them. The walls change colors and there's fun music, it's just a good time overall! "I highly recommend it" -  someone talking about something else, but it may apply here. Probably. Yep. It definitely works well and is fun, I swear!

(Scroll down to the very bottom, I promise that there is a download there)

Made in 6 weeks for the Games Studio class at the County College of Morris. Has some problems, but I will  try to fix these soon! 

Thanks to everyone in CCM Games Studio for helping out and giving feedback and such, and thanks to my friend Jamie Gold for helping write some dialogue.

Sounds:

https://freesound.org/
